data.system_settings: Firefox Stable v62.03 Windows 10 Pro x64 v1809
data.actual_result: It tries to make an unauthenticated post request to join the server.
data.expected_result: It goes to the server invite.
data.short_description: Clicking join on a verified server in the store page does nothing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Sign out of Discord - Go to the store page. - Open Minion Masters - Click Join on the server.
